Package edu.jhu.hlt.concrete.serialization

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommunicationSerializer
    An implementation of the ThriftSerializer interface explicitly using the Communication class.
    CommunicationTarGzSerializer  
    CommunicationTarSerializer  
    ThriftSerializer<T extends org.apache.thrift.TBase<T,? extends org.apache.thrift.TFieldIdEnum>>
    Interface for de/serialization of 'thrift-like' objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoundedThriftSerializer<T extends org.apache.thrift.TBase<T,? extends org.apache.thrift.TFieldIdEnum>>
    This class contains a type-bounded parameter and uses reflection to de/serialize Thrift objects in a semi-generic manner.
    CompactCommunicationSerializer
    Implementation of CommunicationSerializer that uses TCompactProtocol.
    PrintConcreteTarGzArchive  
    TarCompactCommunicationSerializer  
    TarGzCompactCommunicationSerializer  
    ThreadSafeThriftSerializer<T extends org.apache.thrift.TBase<T,? extends org.apache.thrift.TFieldIdEnum>>
    Utility class for convenient serialization of Thrift-like data structures.
